code: import React from'react';import{Icon}from'@iconify/react';import sendCircle from'@iconify/icons-mdi/send-circle';import'./form.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var formInputs=[{id:'name',type:'text',label:'Your name',placeholder:'Andy Zhang'},{id:'tel',type:'tel',label:'Phone number',placeholder:'+1 343 553 3600'},{id:'email',type:'email',label:'Email address',placeholder:'zhphaiandy@gmail.com'},{id:'message',type:'textarea',label:'Your message',placeholder:'How can we help you?
